title: 工业的高级太阳能和矿石世界MOD冲突.怎么解决？？
author: 蛤蟆吃奇奇
txt_content:
如题！！在config[img]file:///C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Tencent\Users\1784722516\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\BV$[M{~ZP}V%V%8HZV_(WF2.jpg[/img]




BV$[M{~ZP}V%V%8HZV_(WF2.jpg (13.76 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2014-7-17 16:51 上传




的高级太阳能的配置文件找不到ID高级太阳能配置文件内容如下：
# Configuration file

####################
# block
####################

block {
    I:blockID=194
}


####################
# general
####################

general {
    I:AdvGenDay=8
    I:AdvGenNight=1
    I:AdvOutput=32
    I:AdvStorage=32000
    I:HybGenDay=64
    I:HybGenNight=8
    I:HybOutput=128
    I:HybStorage=100000
    I:UltHybGenDay=512
    I:UltHybGenNight=64
    I:UltOutput=512
    I:UltStorage=1000000
}


####################
# items
####################

items {
    I:advSolarHelmetID=30576
    I:hybridSolarHelmetID=30577
    I:itemsID=30575
    I:ultimateSolarHelmetID=30578
}


####################
# quantum generator
####################

"quantum generator" {
    I:"Quantum generator default maximum packet size"=512
    I:"Quantum generator default production"=512
}


####################
# recipes settings
####################

"recipes settings" {
    B:"Disable Advanced Solar Helmet recipe"=false
    B:"Disable AdvancedSolarPanel recipe"=false
    B:"Disable DoubleSlab recipe"=false
    B:"Disable Hybrid Solar Helmet recipe"=false
    B:"Disable HybridSolarPanel recipe"=false
    B:"Disable Ultimate Solar Helmet recipe"=false
    B:"Disable UltimateSolarPanel recipe"=false
    B:"Enable hard recipes"=false
    B:"Enable simple Advanced Solar Panel recipe"=false
}

replies.txt_content:
pokemongh 发表于 2014-7-17 20:00
删掉一个mod
解决了，自己琢磨了下，改了下ID—.—
